verbs.description: Perhaps the [V: rising] [ARG1: rate] of suicide -- like that of other societal ills -- is a consequence of our unique fealty to capitalism . The worship of money rewards few while casting most as worthless beyond their capacity to consume and obey . The materials of those who earn , inherit or swindle their way to opulent freedom sadly become the standard from which to measure a person 's worth . Meanwhile , our two - party political system remains loyal to the shareholder class and continues to turn its back on real matters of common people , driving the wedge between rich and poor deeper and ensuring the ascent of the likes of President Donald Trump . Growing misanthropy , poor civics education and the diminutive trust in Congress are prime indicators in the divergence of government of the people , by the people , for the people from the actual quality of democratic governance . While the public relations industry instills democracy is alive and well , look further and see an ever - entrenching oligarchy ensuring the masses will pay so a few shall walk upon golden paths . Can a sick society see its true self when it peers into a mirror ? Life expectancy , welfare and happiness , infant mortality : comparing such metrics to ...

Growing misanthropy , poor civics education and the diminutive trust in Congress are prime indicators in the divergence of government of the people , by the people , for the people from the actual quality of democratic governance . While the public relations industry instills democracy is alive and well , look further and see an ever - entrenching oligarchy ensuring the masses will pay so a few shall walk upon golden paths . Can a sick society see its true self when it peers into a mirror ? Life expectancy , welfare and happiness , infant mortality : [V: comparing] [ARG1: such metrics] [ARG2: to] ...
